lenders.loan_because: I would like to pay it forward!

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.occupational_info: I share education with doctors around the world so they can better treat patients with cancer.

lenders.name: Michele

lenders.name: :  Justine Sagan

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: im down with jesus

lenders.name: Avi
lenders.loan_because: I know there are people out in the world far worse off than I am, and sitting here at home, I didn't think I could do anything to help them. Now that I found this, I can spend my money on something that matters, instead of on something that will rot my teeth or my brain.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a 13 year old student who is interested in helping other people who are less fortunate.

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: I feel I should share my good fortune.

lenders.name: mmm
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.occupational_info: Working with computers, design, visual art and music.

lenders.name: Kirk
lenders.loan_because: Feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: Design & develop software.

lenders.name: Jason & Cathy
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to help someone who is willing to work hard and make their business grow and help their local economy.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are in sales. I sell construction supplies and my wife sells instrumentation that laboratories use to analize different materials.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I am alot better off than most and I wish to give them a opportunity to make there lives better.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: T&t
lenders.loan_because: I want my daughter to learn about helping other people as well as to learn about other countries and lifestyles.  It's a great way to teach her about humanitarianism as well as a little bit of geography  and sociology.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Martin

Everybody should get their chance.
"God does not need to receive, but people need to give." Rich Dad
lenders.occupational_info: Ph.D. student of econometrics, curious about world economics, enjoying time in Italy. Studying history to predict future :)

lenders.name: dagmar2000
lenders.loan_because: it's fun to know i can help out someone all the way across the globe. :) the dollar is still strong! hehe.
lenders.occupational_info: "Balls" said the Queen. "If I had to I'd be King." --  ah, for the lack of 2.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because:
I have so much - God has blessed me greatly with my dear husband, a good job and good health.  With these blessings comes responsibility -- love because I am loved, give because so much has been given to me, help because others have helped me.  

One day, when I was a teenager, I came to realize that I owed a great debt, one I could not pay.  Because he loved me so much, Jesus paid my sin debt and made it possible for me to be in right standing before God.  Anything I can do now to help others and please Him is my way of saying "Thank you".  

Read what Jesus said about himself in the Bible, in the book of John, chapter 14, verse 6.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office at a computer and go to meetings much of my day.  i talk to lots of people and make decisions about what work my people should do.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism works.
lenders.occupational_info: Electronics Test Systems.

lenders.name: Dennis and Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy it.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people find ways to solve their problems.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Bev & Bill& Lisa
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy to make a difference in someone's life!

lenders.name: Reinko
lenders.loan_because: It's fantastic to be able to empower people across the globe. Being privileged with some funds available, let's share and make this a better place!

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in 7th grade and i think that being a part of this program is a great opportunity and seeing people get through hard times in life is really rewarding ;D

lenders.loan_because: as Alice Walker writes "each one must help one up" and I like to help someone to a better life as mine has been blessed by God

lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I can.  There's enough to go around if we'd all do just a little.  Kiva makes it pretty easy. The ROI is good for the borrower, and great for my heart.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I produce science education materials.

lenders.name: Michele & David
lenders.loan_because: We want to help empower women around the world to support themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: We all need to support each other more.. whether it's financial or motivational, every little bit helps.

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of a developmentally  delayed man.

lenders.name: bfb

lenders.occupational_info: We build custom single family homes in the DFW metroplex (Texas).

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the love  of Jesus Christ and what he has done for me by saving me and giving me eternal life and the hope he extends to all those who confess their sins to Him, repent and trust in Him for the forgiveness of their sins. He has paid the price for all of us, we just need to humble ourselves and accept His gift of forgiveness.   God Bless

lenders.name: Janet Quebec, Canada

lenders.loan_because:
My friend Cat gave me a gift certificate! Thanks Cat! 
Jesus cares for humanity. We should follow His example!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It is absolutely the right thing to do and it makes me feel warm and fuzzy inside.
lenders.occupational_info: I do volunteer work with human and animal welfare groups, veterans groups and anywhere I can make the planet better.

lenders.name: Erica

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I grew up poor and I know what a difference such a small amount can make.

lenders.name: Helen

lenders.occupational_info: medicine and public health

lenders.name: Bree
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the ability to provide for their families,  a job that pays a living wage, and the satisfaction of making a difference in the world through their work.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and market new food products.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have had a tremendous number of opportunities in my life, and I'd like to make sure that others some, too.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in publishing.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: Spending $25 on a pizza is easy, giving $25 to a person in need should be easier!  Who says they don't have the money?
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and watch my son and my brother's two children.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I feel good when I do things for people. The most humbling moment in my life was when I had to ask a church for money to eat and get baby milk - some 48 years ago. I never forgot how it made me feel when someone did something for me when I needed it most.  By giving you receive. Like others have said - I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people empower themselves, meet their goals and achieve financial independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with middle school students at a diverse public school in Arlington, VA.

lenders.name: Decker
lenders.loan_because: Preschooler, learning to help others

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make better lives for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and repair machinery for an industrial quartz glass company. I also do some inspection and shipping.

lenders.name: Anny
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in school to become an eye doctor.  :)

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: we all have a vision for our lives. I was blessed to have all the opportunities to reach my true potential, though I recognize most in this world are not even given a choice. I have great faith that we can change the world one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am finishing my law degree in May and will be an attorney in October. I'll do my best to uphold the rule of law, and use my talents to help others whenever I can.

lenders.name: Andrea de Palma
lenders.loan_because: Tzedakah is an important part of my life.

lenders.loan_because: it seemed like a neat thing to do.  My neighbors here in the USA are from Ghana.  Rose and Kwasi are wonderful people and I picked a person from Ghana.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the government provide benefits to people in need.

lenders.name: ManMohan
lenders.loan_because: Feed  a person for one day and sure the person is happy for the day or until he feels hungry.  Provide a means to sustain for life time and the person is never hungry for life.  This is what KIVA stands for and what I honestly believe in
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan for their future.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I believe anyone who believes in themselves and has a good work ethic should be afforded the opportunity to better themselves.  I wish each and every one good luck in their endeavors and good health.  Best wishes from the USA.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Telecommunications Industry as a Contractor for a Major Telephone Company.  My job entails monitoring alarms in Company sites all over the US.  I work from the Power Control Center or Network Operations Center.  I previously installed the very same equipment (DC Power Plants) that I am now monitoring and have reached Retirement age.  Just waiting on the right time, or the urge to finally retire.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: You deserve to be helped as I have been in the past. Pass the favor forward when you can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make machinery work, I write the computer programs that tell machines what to do

lenders.name: Anita

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit that helps other nonprofits make the world a better place

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great opportunity to help someone help themselves with a small loan.  Great things come in little packages.  Let's make some great things happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I design databases for a company that sells farm (and other) machinery around the world.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: a bit of money from me helps someone else achieve their goals. I find it inspiring and wonderful that people without a lot of money are willing to work so hard to provide for their families.

lenders.name: Fumi
lenders.loan_because: I want people to be what they want to become, do what they want to in their life, and become happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a traveler

lenders.name: Scott Olszowiec

lenders.name: pepe
lenders.occupational_info: working with little kids is the most amazing and refreshing experience

lenders.name: Nanc
lenders.loan_because:
There are good people trying to make an honest living for themselves, their family and their community.  They have the passion, drive and commitment - now all they need is a little seed money.  

I loan because I can.  
(And for as little as $25 - you can too!)

My seed money is a true circle of life - once a loan is repaid, I can re-lend and continue to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Store Manager of a kitchen supply store. I sell dishes, cookware, tools, appliances and textiles.

lenders.name: Water City
lenders.loan_because: this is a chance to add movement (action) to the things we say are most important.
lenders.occupational_info: retelling the story of Jesus

lenders.loan_because: Humanity... If I can help people have a better life and succeed, and I am able to donate.....why wouldn't I?
lenders.occupational_info: Geology is Earth Science.  It is the study of  the Earth's history, processes, and ultimately an understanding of the world we occupy.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach English language and literature for my university.

lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy all creative activities and I try to be a reflection of God's love to all I meet.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a sophomore in college who is trying to be successful in life. I always have homework and I always gotta study. I try to do my best in school and if I am wealthy, it would be my pleasure to continue on to help the less fortunate.

lenders.name: Barbara

lenders.occupational_info: I answer telephones, book & create appointments, and assist doctors in a medical clinic.

lenders.name: Grover
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone to help themselves.  I'm thankful that I've been given enough to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for the State of Georgia Social Services Department for 34 years.  In that time, I did it all from direct casework to deputy director of the agency.  My job for the last 10 years of my employment was in Quality Assurance doing federally mandated program reviews - a good way not to be popular.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance
lenders.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them make automobiles run better, cleaner, with more features.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: it feels wonderful to help people help themselves.  My main interest is assisting women with children to achieve sustainable careers.
lenders.occupational_info: I am beginning a teaching career after earning a college degree in my 40s.

lenders.name: Salvina
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part in helping others realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I thought it would be a small way to make a big difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Mary Ann & Kelly
lenders.loan_because:
We can, and it's our true privilege to share with others and help them lead self-sufficient live.
We share this as a family, and we choose each new loan with our boys, and they continue to learn more about the world by reading the profiles of the entrepreneurs, where they are from, and their descriptions.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy sharing my resources with others
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer with the Peace Corps which was started by John F. Kennedy and is paid for by the United States government. We work with countries all over the world who ask for our help.

lenders.loan_because: Hi!

lenders.name: kumar
lenders.loan_because: community needs more support
lenders.occupational_info: Being a part of a Non governmmental non profit organisation DURAISAMYGENEROUS SOCIAL EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, I work for the upliftment of the downtrodden people in the villages. We believe strongly that education and training will make a person financially independent.

lenders.name: Mina Javaherbin
lenders.loan_because: I am a part of this world.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with words and knowledge to make the world a better place is good, but giving money to help also means love.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.occupational_info: I provide legal representation to preserve access to habitable and affordable housing and I represent individuals experiencing homelessness to help remove barriers to housing and employment.

lenders.name: Alistair
lenders.loan_because: Recently returned to New Zealand after 3 years in Papua New Guinea and 10 years in Indonesia.  I have seen how a small amount of money in Western terms can make a huge difference to someone in a developing country

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: The little I do can make a huge difference to those in need.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Having travelled, fairly extensively, and seen some of the poorer areas of the 'Third World', I'd suggest that 'every little helps'; so I do it because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Heavily involved in Genealogy, can be quite painful to discover the truth!

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have had good education and opportunities.  Everybody deserves the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach human anatomy and physiology.  I am also a nurse.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.occupation: a person trying to be good

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower woman and provide financial support to assist them to become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 32 year old wife and mother of 2 young boys.  After over 9 years of working in banking, I was diagnosed with terminal cancer and became a stay at home mother and wife.   Each day is a gift and helping someone else is the best gift you can ever give.

lenders.name: ann
lenders.loan_because: I still have hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working in the operating room at a Combat Support Hospital in Baghdad.

lenders.name: Nicki
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Luca and Anette
lenders.loan_because: To directly assume responsibility over providing economically disadvantaged areas with additional opportunities for all to make their living.
lenders.occupational_info: Luca helps governments better understand their responsibilities towards their citizens. Anette helps her children become mature, happy and responsible adults.

lenders.name: Mitch
lenders.loan_because: out of His love. Luke 11:11-13.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to do good:)

lenders.name: Tomasa
lenders.loan_because: I like the fact that even the small amount I may be able to give can impact someone else's life and bless them.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: Starting with nothing and being given an opportunity by a stranger with a little money and faith in you is the real American ideal. It is only right to give that opportunity to people who aren't as fortunate as we are, not because of anything they did wrong, but because they happened to be born somewhere else. It feels so good to know that you don't have to have $500 or $1,000 to change someone's life. We can all pitch in a little and make a huge difference to someone we will probably never meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and manage instructions for a team that keeps 24/7 watch on all our computer systems so we can find a problem before it starts hurting business.

lenders.name: Dominic
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is the will people to do something good, if they are given the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in educational exchange; helping students from China find opportunities to study abroad

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: without different holes on a flute, there would be no music.....

lenders.name: Dianira
lenders.loan_because: the world can and will change with the mighty ripples created by our drops of donations.
lenders.occupational_info: I created a method to teach Spanish to English speaking kids.  I teach teachers.

lenders.name: Ahmed
lenders.loan_because: I have what others don't .........
lenders.occupational_info: Very interesting. Love what I do. Its all about computer networking and switches and routers and the lots.

lenders.name: Catarino
lenders.loan_because: It's a small drop on the ocean, but  many small drops makes the ocean.
lenders.occupational_info: Thoughts & Doodles for the interwebz.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in giving something back.  I am grateful for all that I have and I feel that it is only right to share it with those who need a helping hand.  Karma is a wonderful thing!

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my assets with people less fortunate than I have been
lenders.occupational_info: I design ecommerce website for a variety of clients throughout the world. I would initially like to offer my services to several people who are located anywhere, and create a website where they can market and sell their products (clothing especially) worldwide in a growing global online marketplace. If someone wants to sell their products online I would love to help them. I will donate the web domain name, hosting costs and create the site for them at no charge. Please email me if you are interested!

lenders.name: Jack Pearce
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving a helping hand to those who work to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am CFO to a small, privately owned manufacturing business.

lenders.name: Jinny
lenders.loan_because: My life is so blessed and I need to share those blessings with others so that they might have opportunities to enrich their lives and the lives of others in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I look at information and use it to help students graduate from college.

lenders.name: Scott Scriver
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life and have been looking for a way to help others.  Being able to provide someone with the funding needed to help them be successful is very rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer.  I have helped many start-up organizations with my skills.

lenders.name: Shannon Tucker-White
lenders.loan_because: "It's ALL about giving back and making a difference, even if it is to ONE person"

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure computers work for people at the many companies I service

lenders.name: Colette
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is important to support others that have the desire to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the owner of a small business IT consulting firm.

lenders.name: martyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: office based

lenders.name: Rene'
lenders.loan_because: It is my way of helping someone that may need my assistance at this time.  In the future, I hope they will do the same for someone else.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: I believe a small contribution of money can make a dramatic change

lenders.name: Gwen
lenders.loan_because: There are many people in need who are less fortunate than I and I want to help them.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: it's one way I can do something to help someone who needs it without it being "charity".

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Small things can have big results.

lenders.name: Rosemary
lenders.loan_because: I've had many times in my life when I've needed help and been on the receiving end; now it's time (and a privilege) to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: I do direct customer contact and find it very rewarding.

lenders.name: Air-Tites.com, Inc.
lenders.loan_because: We know how hard it is to start a business without a lot of money for startup costs.  Been there, done that, not easy.  Hope we can make a difference by helping someone.
lenders.occupational_info: We are one of the biggest coin collecting supply websites in the United States.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: You can't depend on gov'ts to pull people up.  It is small businesses that employ the world!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a financial planner.  I help people plan their finances and business.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: It's a joy to partner with businesses and people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a busy office entering information on a computer.  I answer lots of questions and do whatever it takes to make the office run smoothly.

lenders.name: Piotr
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that creates applications for mobile devices.

lenders.name: Chastina
lenders.loan_because: A little can do so much.
lenders.occupational_info: We are group of young professionals in New York city who are inspired by Kiva's mission. We hope to grow this group and reinvest our original capital to give other entrepreneurs a "leg up."

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: While I struggle with the interest rates these people are required to pay, in the end, I feel Kiva is truly trying to help.

lenders.name: Moritz
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who work hard to build a better future for themselves and their children

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: Lending is an extension of the work I have done assisting people to become more self-sufficient, through vocational counseling, and many types of volunteer work. When you help one person, you help everyone with whom they come in contact. It is personal, one to one, and it is also extended.
lenders.occupational_info: When I was a vocational counselor I worked at a school advising students who were taking classes for job skills and life skills. I have continued to help students, friends, and family when a need is brought to my attention, and I seek out opportunities to volunteer in the community among those who might find this helpful. (The photo above is of my mother and myself.)

lenders.name: Caroline & Colin
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our wealth with others around the world, and give them the same chance that I was given, many years ago.
lenders.occupational_info: We started with nothing, worked very hard, saved and slowly my business grew, and can now support my family, and share a little wealth with others not so fortunate.

lenders.name: Louise and Nick
lenders.loan_because: we're all tied together in this world.  I'm helping a sister or brother whom I haven't ever met.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: karma

lenders.name: Nora
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Willson
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of helping others in need when we have the ability to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: We do financial analysis for an oil and gas exploration company.

lenders.name: Nadine
lenders.loan_because: I am able to. I think that we should all consistently think of ways to make life better for those in need.

lenders.name: PennyCapital, LLC.
lenders.loan_because: We are in the business of helping others help themselves.  I think this is a great opportunity to help and Kiva.org makes it possible
lenders.occupational_info: We all need each other, United we stand and can make a difference.  The community coming together to help one another by micro loans to Property owners losing their homes due to the economy and changing circumstances.

lenders.name: K104
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to better their own lives if they are willing to do the work.

lenders.name: Kim

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all I have, and wish to pay it forward to others who have needs that I can assist.  Making a difference is a huge part of who I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I've spent my time in the technology world, but the same time working with charities.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an executive in an IT (technology) company, managing the operations of our data center and the technology services we provide.

lenders.name: JOHN
lenders.loan_because: IT FEEL'S GOOD TO HELP
lenders.occupational_info: I SELL HERBS AND VITAMINS TO KEEP PEOPLE HEALTHY NATURALY

lenders.name: Phil & Margot
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people that will help themselves

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people who are trying to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Admin. Secretary, am widowed, mother of 3, and grandmother of 6

lenders.name: Raffaella Droghetti
lenders.loan_because: In this fast running world, I enjoy to stop ten minutes and do something for others. Better helping people than doing shopping when online.

lenders.name: Johan
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for me to contribute in making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: :esuaceb naol I
lenders.occupational_info: I help a large corporation keep the stockholders happy.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people empower themselves and create a future that is full of hope for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I help international students come to America to study at my University.

lenders.name: Joost
lenders.loan_because: It is my humble contribution to a better world. In my opinion it is also a more useful and a more respectful alternative to charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teams developing and supporting web applications for e-commerce using Agile methods and practices (Scrum, KanBan and Extreme Programming). The ultimate goal is to improve customer experience while creating more business value too.

lenders.name: Torrey
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple way to help people who are trying to change their lives, and it's a great way to feel connected to people around the world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children and families to help them cope with emotional problems.

lenders.name: Dakota
lenders.loan_because: Kiva facilitates hope, champions empowerment of the disenfranchised and carries the torch for a kinder and more equitable world.

lenders.name: Michael McCulloch
lenders.loan_because: I was in Uganda in 2007 funding a project on HIV/AIDS in one of the refugee camps.  The health promoter I was with talked about her hope that one day women would have enough control over their lives to protect their own health. And one of the best ways to do this is by becoming economically independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the area of human rights specifically women's human rights and the right to health

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: To reach out a hand to disadvantaged and hard-working people around the world, to give something back, and as an expression of gratitude for all I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: As a paralegal, I help lawyers help people.  As a writer, I mostly research and report findings, such as in legal briefs and short articles, or provide information on a given subject.

lenders.name: Timothy Ciccone
lenders.loan_because: In my travels photographing architecture in Asia I've seen too much poverty firsthand. It's great to help others to help themselves reach their potential.

lenders.name: Ron & Melanie
lenders.loan_because: We like to help others, especially those who are willing to develop a business to support themselves and their family, so that they can be self supporting.
lenders.occupational_info: As a manager, recently retired, in a company which provided computer services to major global corporations, I have worked in many countries and lived for 5 years in Germany. Melanie now serves as a town councillor for Woking. This keeps her very busy and involved in the community.

lenders.name: Court
lenders.loan_because: I want to share and empower people who are ambitious just as my friends and family have done for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur, I start businesses that help people and are environmentally friendly such as http://cleantechauthority.com

lenders.loan_because: Credit  for creating appropriate community will let us all find better futures independent from misguided economic models.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a tractor for one dollar per minute.  I mow brush and fields, move and work soil, as well as work in the forrest.

lenders.loan_because: We hope to help people have better lives and futures.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying at a university so that I can go into business.

lenders.name: Laura & Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Once we were in the know, how could we not.  We hope to help support many entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Laura works for a  company that provides investment / loans to entrepreneurs in  the US.  Ryan works for a software company.

lenders.name: Kayla
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should get a chance to help themselves, and if I can give somebody that chance, that's wonderful.
lenders.occupational_info: I do what I can with what I have to help others.

lenders.name: Ronnie
lenders.loan_because: I can, I should and I will.

lenders.occupational_info: Enjoyable. I have a good boss and I like to figure things out.

lenders.occupational_info: Technology Entrepreneurship

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone help themselves improve their situation.  I also like reading about exactly who I'm helping - makes it more personal, makes me feel like I'm making more of a direct impact on a real person's life and it's fun reading those stories too:)
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a sort of entrepreneur too: I work for my father's construction company.  The company builds large homes.  But I don't actually build the houses, I work in the office doing all the day-to-day bills and ordering building material.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in somebody's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software programs.

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: I am a global traveler, and this is a way to help families and individuals in far-away places.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring large groups of people to Alaska for meetings, events and fun in the wilderness!

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: It takes money to make money.  I want to help.

lenders.name: Ben & Alena
lenders.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
--Winston Churchill

lenders.loan_because: I have a comfortable life in the UK, I hope to help others to attain the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive a lorry with a crane on it to load and off-load.

lenders.name: Marko
lenders.loan_because: It is a nice and smart way to make a real difference. Helping someone far away so practically makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: My work deals with the small-scale carbon sink projects (with integrated biodiversity and local development aspects) in developing countries. I am also interested in the questions related to preventing deforestation and rehabilitating degraded forests in developing countries.

lenders.name: Empowerment Lenders
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference....

lenders.name: amanda
lenders.loan_because: i feel that others need the money more then me
lenders.occupational_info: i love animals

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.occupational_info: Public relations

lenders.name: Derek

lenders.occupational_info: Help large companies with their meetings, symposiums, trade shows, etc. in terms of audio/visual components.

lenders.name: Fernando
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving without the expectation of getting anything in return.

lenders.name: Giorgio
lenders.loan_because: personal ideology
lenders.occupational_info: work, simply. Namely, necessity and the privilege, at the same time.

lenders.name: Amy

lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell real estate - homes and land.

lenders.name: Luke Atencio
lenders.loan_because: James 2:15. its a way to love my brothers and sisters. everyone on this planet is made in the image of God, we are all a family.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a musician and an artist.

lenders.name: Daina
lenders.loan_because: Someone out there needs my help, and I know one day when I need the help, someone out there will help me too. :)
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching, loving and helping grow the only important things in my life.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I feel as though the world needs help.  In helping these entrepreneurs build up their businesses, we can help their economy tremendously.  We are empowering these people by lending our money to them.  We're saying, yes you can do it, you can live your dream.  A little goes a long way.  "Feed a man a fish and he'll eat for a day, teach a man to fish and he'll eat forever."

lenders.name: Thi
lenders.loan_because: bums stick together
lenders.occupational_info: package subprime mortgages (pleasedont judge me)

lenders.name: Louis

lenders.name: traci

lenders.name: Judith Chapman

lenders.occupational_info: The stars of Daytime TV and Happy Hour Productions performed "The Trial of the Catonsville 9."  They gave of their time and donated all of the  money raised from tickets sold to Kiva.  For more about the play, go to judithchapman.com.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: Starting a business is really tough - and a lack of money should not restrict one's innovation or prohibit someone from achieving their dream

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Anna Lisa

lenders.name: JC and Kellie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if one is given the right oppurtunity they will achieve success and therefore be able to share in their success
lenders.occupational_info: Design and build roads, signals, bridges, and land development that improves the quality of life and world access

lenders.occupational_info: I study organizational structure and theory, and also work in computer science, especially in artificial intelligence and computational biology.

lenders.name: * sami jo*

lenders.name: bryana
lenders.loan_because: Karma

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because:
I have been so lucky to have had so many opportunities in my life and I want others to have a chance to achieve their potential. 
I believe everyone can make a difference and everyone has an obligation to try and make the world a better place.

lenders.name: MICHAEL
lenders.loan_because: I want to change someones life for the better
lenders.occupational_info: I work with troubled adolescents that may have been abused or addicted to drugs

lenders.name: Ignacio
lenders.loan_because: if you pick borrowers well you can just keep lending that $100  on and on to make a big difference to many - I like to pick those that want money for capital because that way they can be empowered and pay back. I avoid unhealthy things like lend to soda sellers

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because:
Its a great feeling to be able to learn of other peoples lives across the globe.  To know that in some small way I can give back for all I have recieved in my life.
This is a hand up, not a hand out.  How many of us can actually say we work as hard, under such circumstances?
lenders.occupational_info:
I assist in taking care of handicapped people.  Helping them to be as independent as possible in their daily lives.  
I have learned much more from them then they have from me!

lenders.name: swirkus
lenders.loan_because: I lend because it is a way to repay some of the generosity I have received throughout my life and also because I feel it is the least I can do considering I had the good fortune to be born in such a prosperous country.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It helps
lenders.occupational_info: Numbers

lenders.name: Christin & Scott
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a positive difference in the lives of others.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me to achieve my goals, and I want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Olatunji and Omara
lenders.loan_because: It's our own small way of reaching out in Christian love to those less fortunate than we are.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I heard Muhammad Yunus speak last year at Vanderbilt University and was greatly inspired. Months later I read about KIVA in Spirit Magazine on board a Southwest Airlines flight.  After reading this article I knew that a portion of my paycheck would go toward KIVA.  We are so fortunate in our country to have abundance and opportunity, it seems simple to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with other women in a large kitchen putting together meals for large gatherings, meetings, social events. We use fresh, in-season ingredients, and grow our own herbs that we use in the recipes. We put the prepared food in our cars and transport it to the event site.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: it might help
lenders.occupational_info: I encourage people to love God and do what He says, the best thing they can do for themselves

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because:
I am thankful for all that has been provided for me by my family and honored to be living in a country that cares about the global community.

I know that hard work is not always enough and am glad to be a catalyst in change for people who dream of making their lives and their community better.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage projects for IT (computers) deployments globally.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am disabled and live on a fixed income. This is something I can do on my income to make life better for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a registered nurse in an intensive care unit for 30 years.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I have a small business, and it makes me happy to use some of my profits to help others grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, make & sell knitwear, other clothing & accessories, and jewelry.

lenders.loan_because: It contributes to giving people who need just a little help become successful individuals in whatever path they are on.

lenders.name: chris

lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner in a company that provides real estate development services and asset management for investors.

lenders.name: Tyler

lenders.name: Amye
lenders.loan_because: to help be Christ's hands in the world

lenders.name: Krishan
lenders.loan_because: This is my birthday present - I am now five and my parents would like me to help

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: As a former Peace Corps Volunteer, I know that relatively small amounts of money can make a difference in people's lives ...and we are, indeed, all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: As a psychologist, my job is to help people suffering from emotional distress.  I am married and have two grown sons.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I am so happy to have the opportunity to give back to a few of the amazing people in countries I've visited and loved, and I appreciate that Kiva gives the full amount of the loan to the entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I would hope someone would do the same for me.

lenders.name: Rebekkah
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and recognize the difference between a "hand-up" and a "hand-out".
lenders.occupational_info: My company designs and builds web sites to help businesses reach customers in new and creative ways.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I  want to do my small part to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.occupation: I run an Office Services Company
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes, all one needs, is one small show of faith, and they become the person they were always meant to be. I loan because I'd like to think that I can help someone improve their lives on what I could have spent in ten minutes buying something that I don't even need. I do, becaues I can,  and thank the good Lord everyday, because it truely is better to give than to recieve. I'm not even remotely well off but compared to what I've seen I'm rich beyond words.
lenders.occupational_info: I handle many of the office needs of a small trucking firm that moves Mobile Homes across the USA. I do everything from billing to taking phone calls, optaining permits, and many other things that come along on any given day.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: corinne
lenders.loan_because:
I am a believer...that, "we must be the change we wish to see in the world"  
~ Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info:
In my work, I help people with physical disabilities become more functionally independent and capable in their daily living skills.  I work for a community based non-profit organization with the core philosophy and fervent mission to help adults and seniors with disability attain adequate medical care and support services for their well being; and, to be able to remain living sustainably in their own community.

In my lifepath, simply put: I am an ordinary person wanting to see our humanity live and breathe its “sacred” meaning, purpose, and belonging.
.
.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital.

lenders.name: Rudy
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help each other out, this site alone should prove that one person can make a difference in someone's life!!!

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I hope  for a better world

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: Sharing for a friendlier world.

lenders.name: Spencer Chris Sammie
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our blessings and gifts to help others have a better life just like Uncle Reb does.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students.  We go to school and love to play sports and dance.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Life has given my family much more than we deserve. I hope to spread my good fortune to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Lending money in the US

lenders.occupational_info: i make coffee.

lenders.name: Carol and K9 Meg
lenders.loan_because: I believe in economies of scale,  or rather,  scaling economy for the betterment of people who are otherwise disenfranchised from large economic systems. It's grassroots "people to people" networking.
lenders.occupational_info:
Coffee roasting is my second career after 35 years as a wildlife /fisheries biologist. Roasting brings me closer to coffee producers, who are like the recipients of these microloans.  
Roasting  specialty coffees enables me to educate my coffee customers about the people to whom they owe their beverage .

lenders.name: Tiana
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that I may have a small impact on someone's chance to improve their and their family's financial well-being.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: My family is very blessed.  We have plenty of food and clothing,  and a cozy house.  It's good to share what we have.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: things are meant to be better.
lenders.occupational_info: help people retire with integrity ~ retirement consulting.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in starting small and building to bigger things. I believe in trust and in good nature. I believe that win/win relationships exist. I loan because it works.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a variety of fields including manufacturing and Environmental and Socially responsible media.

lenders.name: Georgina Kaye
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give. - Winston Churchill

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I am making steps to become a better, truly happier person. Instead of giving to something short term like feeding starving children (which is very important!), I figured that I would contribute to something that makes progress (Once you give money to unicef or something, the children will still be hungry after your contribution is all spent.) I figured why not contribute to something that has the chance of making the world a more prosperous place?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a working college student and barely making it! Even though I'm not super wealthy, I can contribute, because I know that not everyone has the same opportunities that I do.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: received a gift certificate

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a multi national confectionary company.

lenders.name: Arnav
lenders.loan_because: of child in me, who wants a beautiful world, full of happiness.

lenders.name: Ugi
lenders.loan_because: It brings good karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people market their products and services effectively.

lenders.name: Sung June
lenders.occupational_info: Biomedical Engineering to Help Sensory and Motion Impaired People

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I understand that people need helping hands to achieve something greater.
lenders.occupational_info: My main gig is international business development, but I also build websites for individuals and small businesses.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: It's a way for me to feel in contact with individuals around the world, with no bureaucracy to get in the way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of English to children ages 14 and 18.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I would like to think that a community of microlending can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: My work, involves working with people to improve manufacturing processes.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of assisting entrepreneurs with small loans that are paid back--especially considering how much further money can go in "third world" regions.
lenders.occupational_info: A former English teacher, I now write/edit educational materials for a small IT company.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed by God with many gifts and wish to share with others throuugh the use of my time, talents, and resources.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I've had so many people in my life help me.
lenders.occupational_info: Saving the salmon, helping to protect, restore, and enhance the environment!

lenders.name: The Butler-Dash family
lenders.occupation: A family interested in helping others
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate to have good health and a happy life.  We would like to help others to have the same if we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Joel (husband/father) helps companies around the world get the products they make to their customers faster and more cheaply.  Toni (wife/mother) cares for their young children (Grace and Gabriel) and their home.

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: Self-Sustainability - give people the opportunity to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial Executive with extensive in-depth business and technical knowledge in the Luxury Goods Industry specifically Jewelry and Watches

lenders.name: roxana
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: nora
lenders.loan_because: i want to support women in their endeavours, and this program makes total sense.
lenders.occupational_info: i make patchwork quilts that tell stories about the people who will use them.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to pursue their dreams.  An opportunity to contribute to that pursuit is exciting.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a portfolio manager for a wealth management group working primarily with individuals and their investments.

lenders.name: TAMIR
lenders.loan_because: Simply, to make a difference in someone’s life.
lenders.occupational_info: easy, fun, rewarding and worth doing

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and I want to give back to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the District Manager of 11 retail stores located in 3 different states.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to help people improve the quality of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Software Test Manager

lenders.name: Lowe Funding Group
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I loan to help enable people obtain their dreams when they might not otherwise be given the chance.  I know there are a lot of less fortunate people in the world but that doesn't mean that they are less of a person or a member of society.  I loan to help create equality among people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company in the Information Technology department.  My work consists of project planning and deployment, research and development, and supporting applications that I am responsible for.

lenders.name: suji
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have an opportunity to succeed in life. I also believe in Jesus and He calls us to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I design structures for large companies for special events.

lenders.name: Han and Glen
lenders.loan_because: we like to support the work that others do for their family and community
lenders.occupational_info: We work in a university laboratory doing research to understand biology and human disease

lenders.name: Monique
lenders.loan_because: This is such a clever way to help people. And helping someone expand their ability to make a living has a greater impact in so many ways. It feels good that what little I have can do so much.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.occupational_info: Hello.

lenders.name: Nola
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a living, and to know that a person can reach out and help others dreams come true is a privilege and honor.
lenders.occupational_info: I helped care for sick people.

lenders.name: Cameron
lenders.loan_because: I   had   200  dollars and I  wanted  to share  some  of   it  through Kiva.

lenders.name: Lydia & Travis
lenders.loan_because: We are so very blessed by the Lord

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help in any way possible to anyone who is trying to better their lives...more than likely...trying to better lives of loved ones more so than their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring medicines to facilities that care for the elderly when they can no longer care for themselves.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: The world isn't changed for the better through committees, through imposing new regimes or systems. The world is changed by individuals acting out of compassion, and choosing to be generous.

lenders.name: Bob Bennett
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and learn more about micro lending. Long term I want to create a platform similar to this one that not only provides the capital for micro businesses but also the education, training, and expertise for mirco businesses to be as successful as possible, in other words micro business building.
lenders.occupational_info: My business invests in small privately held businesses and acts as their coach and mentor to help them be more successful.

lenders.name: luwangula
lenders.loan_because: To put the knowledge acquired in school to use, and swim across the poverty/unemployment river
lenders.occupational_info:
I hold a bachelors degree in Food Science and Technology, obtained locally in my Countries best university.
Unemployment is a global issue. However, we acquire knowledge from institutions enough to self employ but without any capital

Am starting a number on personal businesses where I can employ others as a mitigation to fight poverty.

I intend to start poultry business on medium scale, as well as a wholesale/retail pharmacy in my home town. I need $3000 to succeed.

Any level of assistance is welcome.
God bless

lenders.name: Anton
lenders.occupational_info: Import-Export Company

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have had people help me out along the way and I wanted to pass that along.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide Pre-Employment and Tenant Screening Services

lenders.name: Evi
lenders.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way.

lenders.name: Lyle
lenders.loan_because: While I also give charitably to meet immediate needs, encouraging entrepreneurialism and development is a long-term, sustainable solution for people in the majoirty world to address their own challenges.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a NGO that helps people grow in their inner life of Christian spirituality and outer life of compassion in the world.

lenders.name: Josh & Louise
lenders.loan_because: We have created businesses and know how difficult it is especially in areas where there is little chance for financial backing.   Proud to be a part of this.

lenders.name: Saleem Sheikh
lenders.loan_because:
Give something back to the community and to help those who are less fortunate than us.

It will make you feel good and you will help someone stand on their own feet. 

 “Give someone a fish and you feed him for a day; Teach someone to fish and you help them to feed themselves for ever"

Go ahead and do it ! Now!

lenders.name: Saviz
lenders.loan_because: I want to help alleviate poverty and I believe one way is to provide low interest micro loans to those can transform, manufacture, grow, cultivate, or provide services to create a sustainable source of income for themselves, family, and community.
